---
layout: post
title: Old robot doodles
categories: art
---

While I certainly wouldn't call myself an artist, I do enjoy drawing caricatures. After all, who doesn't want to be famous and cool like [Vi Hart](http://vihart.com/)? I do, that's for sure.

These were even drawn before I got a tablet.

I ironically haven't done much since I did get a pen-equipped tablet... except for make the favicon for this site just now. There's more to come for sure.
